mapper.select: select * from inquery_db order by i_idx desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into inquery_db (i_idx, u_idx, i_tle, i_con, i_dat, i_ans, a_idx, i_acon) values (#{i_idx}, #{u_idx}, #{i_tle}, #{i_con}, now(), #{i_ans}, #{a_idx}, #{i_acon})
mapper.update: update inquery_db set i_tle=#{i_tle}, i_con=#{i_con}, i_ans=#{i_ans}, a_idx=#{a_idx}, i_acon=#{i_acon} where i_idx = #{i_idx}
